name: Bulbasaur
desc: Bulbasaur is a Grass/Poison type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Seed Pokémon.

pokedex_data.Local \u2116: 001 (Red/Blue/Yellow)226 (Gold/Silver/Crystal)001 (FireRed/LeafGreen)231 (HeartGold/SoulSilver)080 (X/Y — Central Kalos)001 (Let's Go Pikachu/Let's Go Eevee)068 (The Isle of Armor)

pokedex_entries.RedBlue: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.
pokedex_entries.Gold: The seed on its back is filled with nutrients. The seed grows steadily larger as its body grows.
pokedex_entries.Silver: It carries a seed on its back right from birth. As it grows older, the seed also grows larger.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seeds on its back in order to grow.
pokedex_entries.RubySapphireEmerald: BULBASAUR can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this POKéMON is born. The seed slowly grows larger.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.
pokedex_entries.DiamondPearlPlatinum: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: The seed on its back is filled with nutrients. The seed grows steadily larger as its body grows.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: It carries a seed on its back right from birth. As it grows older, the seed also grows larger.
pokedex_entries.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
pokedex_entries.X: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.Y: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
pokedex_entries.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go PikachuLet's Go Eevee: It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.
pokedex_entries.Sword: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.
pokedex_entries.Shield: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: For some time after its birth, it grows by taking nourishment from the seed on its back.

location.Brilliant DiamondShining Pearl: Grassland Cave, Swampy Cave, Riverbank Cave, Still-Water Cavern, Sunlit Cavern, Bogsunk Cavern
